author: fielding
msg: Back-out premature config changes for buckets.

author: rbb
msg: Add my most recent patch and the other files necessary to make it work.
This patch brings Apache to a point, where most pages are sent without
using BUFF except for the headers.  All legacy modules will work with this
patch, although they will all require a memcopy just to be on the safe

author: rbb
msg: Change to use read/write buckets by default.  This will need to be cleaned
up a bit.  Basically, I will think we want to use rwmem if they are the
last bucket in the list, and rmem if there are no rwmem buckets at the
end of the brigade.  This solves the problem of current modules not working

author: rbb
msg: Add ap_consume_buckets.  This just destroys a specified number of buckets
off the front of the brigade.
